Package iot

Class Environment

java.lang.Object
iot.Environment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A class representing a map of the environment.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Environment

      public Environment​(Characteristic[][] characteristics, org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition mapOrigin, int numberOfZones, java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition> wayPoints, java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​Connection> connections)
      A constructor generating a new environment with a given map with characteristics.
      Parameters:
      characteristics - The map with the characteristics of the current environment.
      mapOrigin - coordinates of the point [0,0] on the map.
      numberOfZones - the number of zones defined in the region.
      wayPoints - a map of waypoints (ID -> coordinates).
      connections - a map of connections (ID -> connection).
